Language.name: cs
Language.Text:
Øíká se, že v Labyrintu žijí krvežíznivá monstra, která ti vysají mozek z hlavy a ...
Houby monstra, jsou to umìlé bytosti, které støeží vyspìlé technologie. Najdou tì a znièí v jediném záblesku energie ...
Ticho! ... Ticho, zdá se mi, že támhle se nìco hýbe ...
Jonesi, ty umíš plavat.
Zkus najít zpùsob, jak elektrický výboj doèasnì pøerušit.

Language.name: en
Language.Text:
They say that bloodthirsty monsters live in the Labyrinth, which will suck the brain from your head and ...
No damn monsters, they are artificial beings, who are guarding advanced technologies. They will find you and destroy you in a single flash of energy ...
Quiet! ... Quiet, it seems that something is moving over there ...
Jones, you can swim.
Try to find a way to temporarily shut off the electrical discharge.
